p:
We also investigated how Arabidopsis recognizes the invasion of fungal pathogens and then mounts its postinvasive resistance. We found that the two bak1 mutations, especially the bak1–5 mutation, reduce postinvasive resistance against Ab (Fig. 4). The finding that the negative effects of bak1-5 on the postinvasive resistance towards Ab was higher than that of bak1-4 is likely consistent with the previous works
25 .
